item.title: International Consensus Games
item.description: I’ve been working on a pet project recently: Consensus games are a fun new way to play together through social media… While we wait for some more accounts to be approved across the fediverse, here’s a little intro to the idea and an update on progress…

item.title: Wriggler
item.description: This is a necropost, resurrected from an old blog. Wriggler It was 1998 and I was 17.
